Text: Man everything looks perfect, but how do i know the format. im not the greatest at all the technical jargon. i have figured out that mpeg4 plays on my tv and MKV if i convert the audio. Thanks a mill ill just have to give it a go. it would be tons easier with format info, though. But still i thank you for the awesome resolution, your time, and oh ya,.....ITS FREE!!!!!
greasy its mkv. just click at the "files" ,u see its 1?  thats how I know what format is when there's no format info :)

Has 2 thick parallel vertical lines proceeding repeatedly from left to right across the picture.

Other than that, high quality.

I'm going to look for an alternative copy.

Disregard my previous comment, red lines were not present on second viewing.  Must have been a player bug on my end.

Flawless, would download again.
